Through great deeds, this character has earned the pretext to employ the De Jure Kingdom Claim casus belli within the Empire.
Holy War Cooldown
Rulers may only wage holy war once every 5 years.
Seize City/County Cooldown
Patricians can only use the Seize County or Seize City CBs once every 5 years.

Imperial Reconquest - Tier 6
You are on the 1st tier of Imperial Reconquest, which grants CB on the core Byzantine lands.
You are on the 2nd tier of Imperial Reconquest, which grants CB against the Balkans and Sicily.
You are on the 3rd tier of Imperial Reconquest, which grants CB against Italy, the Levant, and Africa (but not Western or sub-saharan Africa).
You are on the 4th tier of Imperial Reconquest, which grants CB against Northwest Africa and Iberia.
You are on the 5th tier of Imperial Reconquest, which grants CB against Gallia / France.
You are on the 6th tier of Imperial Reconquest-- the final Roman frontier, which grants CB against England, Wales, parts of Germania, and parts of Pannonia.

[emf_ir_uncontrolled_prov.GetName] is uncontrolled but in this reconquest tier.
